title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. VII, subch. A, pt. 461 - Administrative Law Judge Hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. VII, subch. A, pt. 461 - Administrative Law Judge Hearing

State Regulations
§ 461.1 - Request for hearing under subdivision 1 of section 620 (claimant case)
§ 461.2 - Application for hearing by employer under subdivision 2 of section 620 (employer case)
§ 461.3 - Notice of hearing
§ 461.4 - Conduct of hearing
§ 461.5 - Investigation
§ 461.6 - Adjournment of hearing
§ 461.7 - Transfer of case
§ 461.8 - Reopening

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. VII, subch. A, pt. 461

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §622

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
